scripts.build: astro build && cd ../../ && ng build dfx-bootstrap-table-demo && ng build dfx-qrcode-demo && ng build dfx-transloco-markup-demo && mkdir apps/playground/dist/bootstrap-table/ && mkdir apps/playground/dist/qrcode/ && mkdir apps/playground/dist/transloco-markup && cp -r dist/dfx-bootstrap-table-demo/browser/* apps/playground/dist/bootstrap-table/ && cp -r dist/dfx-qrcode-demo/browser/* apps/playground/dist/qrcode/ && cp -R dist/dfx-transloco-markup-demo/browser/* apps/playground/dist/transloco-markup
